@ERA_railways Good morning. Have you published the 2018 assessment of achievement of common safety targets? The 2017 version was released on 31/03/2017. If not, do you know when it will be released? Thank you.
@ERA_railways Executive Director Josef Doppelbauer confirming the importance of safety at @Prime_Infra https://t.co/RwVccXmlhj
@ERA_railways @cmajrail @Transport_EU Does anyone other than ERA @Transport_EU and OTIF understand this Tweet?
@ERA_railways @Transport_EU @CER_railways @LKB_FEPORT @railjournal @LogitOne @Samskip @covestro @SilviaDeRocchi

urls.title: Measures to increase transparency, accountability and integrity in the EU
urls.description: The European Union needs to enhance the transparency offered by its institutions and Member States. Being an active participant in a democracy means being an active participant in the management of‚Ä¶

text: @ERA_railways @DanielaAiuto Measures to increase transparency, accountability and integrity in the EU https://t.co/NN7GM2ntSN
